name: Tiffany Cope
text: Went to a birthday party here. The kids had a great time! They do such a good job of making sure they all had an actual nice painting to take home! After the kids fill in their pictures, the workers go back and outline and add in details to really bring it to life.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We hope to see you back soon!

name: Lisa Self
text: The Broken Brush is such  a great place to go relax, paint, meet up with your family and friends. The staff is awesome & will help you in anyway they can. They make your visit so enjoyable that it becomes addictive. If you haven’t been what are you waiting for? This should be in your bucket list.

name: Bree Harrison
text: Love this place! Everyone is so helpful and it’s the best little paint place!

name: Jessica Pratt
text: Great little studio located in downtown Athens, Al! Locally owned and operated.

name: Blake Williams
text: Amazing experience every time with Jessica, Jarred, Lisa or Stephanie! Great painting studio in downtown Athens!

name: Charles Stanford
text: Great for date night. Instructors were very helpful and you will amaze yourself of what you can do. We went on Valentines and it was for Couples only. Had a great time! Would recommend this very highly.

name: Vickie Clemmons
text: My daughter paid $45.00 each for both of our projects 2/3 weeks prior to the class. When we arrived, we were told they did not have anyone signed up for that class. My daughter showed her email for payment conformation. The instructor said she would have to cut our pieces. It seemed a bother. We stood around for a while & she finally told us to sit with another class. I feel like we were not shown the attention as everyone else. We had to ask for paint, brushes, & water to clean the brushes. We are pretty crafty so we just looked at the sample and completed it on our own. We did not get holes drilled for the hanger...she could not work the drill and the piece was not sealed. I do not recommend this business. Everyone should be treated with the same attention.....very disappointed!!

name: Nameless Faceless
text:
My mom, niece, and I had a pretty abysmal experience here.
It was our third time doing a sip and paint class (I don't even want to call it a class at this point). There was little to no direction by the "instructor" who made it VERY clear that she was not supposed to be there that late and informed us that the girl who was supposed to teach the class couldn't make it.
Like many other establishments like this, they offer a variety of painting classes at different levels of difficulty. You also have the option to "upgrade" your painting by purchasing a larger canvas.
Another thing that most of these places do is sell the paintings that the instructors do during every class. I wish I could say that they're affordable and worth the price, but that definitely is not the case. When I inquired about which paintings were for sale and about the general cost, the woman got snarky with me. After paying well over $100 to for little to no instruction and having an overall bland experience, I did not want to give this place any more of my money.
PAINTER'S TIP:
I would suggest stopping by Walmart (or ordering off Amazon) and getting a cheap variety pack of paintbrushes (I posted a photo of the pack I purchased). I found that the brushes they supplied were a little worn out and often I couldn't get my lines as thin as I wanted them (I have a heavy hand).

name: Brandi Paustian
text: We love The Broken Brush! Jessica is a great teacher and it is always so much fun. My 12 year old son loves it too.

name: Sipping Tea
text: I just can't even with this place

name: Thomas Anderson
text: Nice to see an artist at work, one that's not only talented but loving his efforts.,

name: James Ekelund
text: I drive an hour one way to explore this enterprise. I always find the lawn rock & stone decor I need, as well as nature's fertilize and other appealing rustic decor. Such a friendly, pleasant relaxing shopping experience at fair & reasonable pricing.

name: Terry Pitman
text: Fran's is a really interesting place with all sorts of things, not just landscaping but also collectibles and adornments for your home. Women would love this place as much as me, it is a very large and nice place to shop and explore.

name: Marta Stauts
text:
I love Fran’s on 59.
It has stones , gravel, beautiful large pots they can covert to fountains plus many garden decorative pieces.
Landscaping services is the best I ever used.
They are amazing to work with, excellent customer service.

name: Motel McCready
text: Fran's on 59 is a very unique. They have lots of cool statuary, fountains, a very large selection of stone. Friendly staff, very helpful  & knowledgeable. Stone patios, ponds, disappearing waterfalls and much more. Highly recommend checking them out.

name: David Swensen
text: There’s something new to see at Fran’s……..the Eclectic Room where you’ll find an amazing collection of high-end interior items including chandeliers, fine art, vintage jewelry, furniture, accent pieces and so much more!. You really must see the assortment to appreciate it.

name: Fran Hopkins
text: There’s something new to see at Fran’s……..the Eclectic Room where you’ll find an amazing collection of high-end interior items including chandeliers, fine art, vintage jewelry, furniture, accent pieces and so much more!. You really must see the assortment to appreciate it.

name: Samuel Hunt
text: We were walking downtown and saw this wonderful shop. I took my 5 yr old daughter in. Rebekah, the owner, had many others there, but was very friendly and assisted my daughter who picked a unicorn to paint. There are lots of art opportunity here. Many clay turning tables. She offers many classes and open sessions, field trips, etc. My child loved it. She has terrific prices. Classes and art are suitable for all ages.

name: Sascha Blackburn
text: Very friendly and fun! My daughter has been wanting to glaze some pottery for a while. She loved the experience! We will be back.

name: Alliyah Guyse
text:
My friend and I went to one of the classes offered and had a wonderful time. The place is adorable and the atmosphere was amazing!
*UPDATED!

“My only complaint is that we were never called (months later) to come pick up what we made. Which was apart of the class! I called and asked when I could expect to pick it up and was left with no assurance that I would ever receive my items 😔”

*UPDATED!
They reached out to me and made things right!! I adore this so much and speaks volumes about the kind of people running this business!

name: Nathan Allen
text: This is a great pottery studio in Hartselle. My kids and I  have glazed many items and have done some classes. I love the creativity that it brings out in my daughter. Also the wheel classes are amazing and Rebecca is a awesome teacher who is very patient with children as well as adults.

name: Paige Parker
text: My mom purchased a gift card for my best friend and I to create vases. We chose the hand-crafted (I think that’s what it was called) option. It was the most calming + fun experience! The staff was so friendly + helpful the entire time. We got to the shop a little after 10:00am and left right before 12:00. We were the only people there. We are already excited to go back for the pumpkin class! HIGHLY recommend this place to everyone, all ages + skill levels!

name: Joy Laws
text: Loved our class making vases!

name: Winchester Jude
text: Love this place! Rebecca puts her heart and soul into providing creative opportunities for all ages. If you have always wondered what it would be like to create your own pottery on the potter's wheel or express yourself by hand-building pottery, this is the place! And if you are an experienced potter needing studio time, it's available at Keramos Ceramics. I find camaraderie and inspiration here.

name: Kaitlynn Simpson
text: My boys had a blast. It was amazing and fun.

name: Rebecca Palacio
text: Amazing studio full of great people and resources. The shop is also well stocked and very convenient for both students and home potters. If you want to try pottery at all I recommend taking a 6 week class here, you will enjoy yourself. I took a pottery class at Calhoun and there is no comparison. Sullivan Street is the way to go. Martha is wonderful and a great artist. I mostly do the self directed classes and she has been very supportive and a big help with all of my pottery needs. Hunter is also excellent for the kids classes and it seems like they have a lot of fun.

name: Jennifer Sandy
text: I just took a Raku class here.  I am hooked.  I'll eventually take all the classes offered here. Great response time.  Answered all my questions.  Going back and taking friends!

resp.text: Thanks, Jennifer! We're so glad you had fun doing raku. It's always a blast!

name: Holly Morgan
text: I love this place! Not only do they provide pottery classes for all levels of experience, and have great supplies for the hobby potter; but they make you feel like part of the pottery family.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We're so happy that you feel at home here.  We love having you around! And your pottery is fabulous!!!

name: Nicole Cecil
text: I can't say enough good things about Sullivan Street Pottery. Every single person there is wonderful and treat me like family!  very knowledgeable teachers. Great prices and, I am truly lucky to have found this place!

resp.text: I think we are the lucky ones! We love having you around. Thank you so much for this kind review. -Martha

name: Phoenix C
text: A group of talented potters and instructors. Martha Marks is an amazing artist and wonderful instructor. Beginners don't hesitate to sign up for the many classes on offer (check their Facebook page for schedule), you will have a ton of fun! Experienced potters can purchase supplies here and enjoy mingling with other local artists. They have a beautiful selection of finished artpieces for purchase as well if you are just a pottery lover.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We love having you at the studio.

name: Gail Cuffe
text: wonderful people, great place to hang out

name: Cher Piette
text: Creating an angel workshop has 2 sessions. Last night I glazed my angel. Once fired I can pick up the final product. Martha is a great instructor.

name: matthew maddox
text: Absolutely wonderful people who were happy to help.

resp.text: Thanks so much for this nice review!  We really appreciate it.

name: James Blackwood
text: Martha is the best.

resp.text: Thanks so much!  ~Martha

name: XENON LASIK
text: Martha and the vandellas were great

name: Brandi Sterling
text: Hunter and Martha are fantastic!

name: Abby Crocker
text: Great staff! Beautiful nursery. Fancy was very helpful to help me find my flowers. Will be coming back! I highly reccomened this place!

name: Susan Johnson
text:
Love, love, love going to Andy’s!!!  This is my Go-To place for spring flowers and my Boston fern! These plants are so well cared for; luscious foliage and continue to grow and provide beauty through Spring and Summer.  You can get Bonus Bucks during the month of March to redeem June 1st-June 10th. The employees are so knowledgeable and helpful and will help getting purchases to car!

Today I made another trip to Andy‘s and Andrew helped me choose my Boston fern for my screened porch and two dwarf globe Japanese Cedars for my front porch! Andrew is always so helpful and friendly and very knowledgeable! I love this place! 🥰

resp.text: Susan - Thank you so much for your glowing review! We always look forward to helping you with all your gardening needs!

name: Orlando J. Carlo
text: Great selection, beautiful plant. They have a rewards program. Great prices.

name: Sarah Liles
text: Everything looked so beautiful and you could tell the plants were taken care of. Prices are good and staff is very helpful and nice. Will definitely return.

resp.text: We look forward to helping you next time you are in! Thanks so much for the great review!!!

name: Christina Gailes
text: Great spot! Super friendly, plenty to choose from, even between seasons! Will be stopping in here regularly!

resp.text: Fantastic! We look forward to helping you with all your gardening needs!

name: Gina Key
text: Love to go to Andy's. They always have the best tomatoes.

name: Martin Bachtel
text: Andy’s is great.   It’s very organized and they have a great staff with lots of experience.   The place is laid out and merchandised well and is very nice.   Being a contractor I use them when I have jobs in Vestavia for good high quality material.

name: Barbara Zary
text: Apathetic employees. Poor customer service. Can’t be bothered to apologize or attempt to make things right.

name: man from earth
text: Great nursery. All the plants look healthy and Jan and the gang are wonderful to deal with.

name: Kevin Gardner
text: Great nursery with a good selection of seasonal plants, planters and garden decorations.

name: Edward DeMellier
text: We almost always find the plants and landscaping materials we want. We get good advice.

name: Jeremy Fisher
text: The mums are about to pop! They have all the colors!

name: JP Cruz
text:
Great selection. Great care and service. Hearty plants, knowledgeable staff. We keep coming back year after year. Consistently hearty plants.

Compared to the big box stores, Andy's plants have had a higher rate of survivability and hardiness. Demonstrably better plants, probably because the staff is so dedicated to the care and feeding of each plant.

Great knowledge of native plant species. The only place in birmingham I can get reliable insect control species and pollinator-friendly species in the same trip. Such a great selection, my son now has his own nursery in his room and is excited to care for each plant daily. Our front and back yards are now much more our own now that we've put roots down. Thank you, Andy! Your staff rocks!

resp.text: Thanks so much for being a loyal customer! We really appreciate your repeat business!

name: Austin Reese
text: Does Andy's source their compost from a landfill? I ordered 8 yards of compost, which itself was excellent quality, but had to remove 2 full yard bins of trash. Aluminum cans, large pieces of plastic, shredded children's clothing, a loaded shotgun shell and thousands of 1-3" rocks. I expected better of Andy's as we love their nursery and farmer's market but this was disappointing.

resp.text: We hate to hear this. Our compost comes directly from the leaf debris collected and composted by the City of Mountain Brook. We will pass along this laundry list of undesirable items. If you ever have an issue with the products we sell, give us a call so we can amend the situation immediately. 824-0233. Next time you are in, let us know and we will come up with something to amend this.

name: Bill Tiemann
text: Andy's is a great nursery and garden supply retailer. Anything I have ever needed in gardening supplies I have generally been able to pick up here. Andy's has anything a weekend gardener might need as well as bulk supplies such as mulch, garden soil gravel, and so forth. The staff is friendly and helpful, prices are competitive, and the two locations I've been to have been excellent. I highly recommend Andy's for your gardening needs and supplies.

resp.text: Thank you for the great recommendation Bill! We always look forward to helping you find just what you need for your landscape and gardening projects.

name: L W
text: This place is a great place to shop. They have great prices on the some on the best looking plants. Great selection too. The staff there is awesome!! They are so helpful and knowledgeable. They are friendly and willing to help with a smile.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the very kind words. We love our customers and we're here to help. We're getting in new merchandise all the time. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Nancy Reaves
text: My experience was wonderful. It was a very welcoming environment and the assistant/employee  was very knowledgeable in all areas that I inquired about. I will most assuredly be back, and will be (highly)recommending them to all my neighbors and friends. I’m thankful for Andy’s in staying the ‘above the rest’ neighborhood nursery we’ve come to know and love.

name: Nicole Matthews
text:
Andy’s is THE best place for home and garden needs. After visiting them I know I need to find a way to incorporate a water feature in my landscape.

For container inspiration and know how consulting Amanda was the best decision. My orchid pots are thriving and look elegant on my dining room table. I’m grateful she took time to explain the design look and thought process behind the design.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Nicole! Great news that your orchids are doing so well. Amanda is a wonderful asset and very knowledgeable.  We are here to help you with all your gardening design needs.

name: Ashley Moran
text: We've used Andy's for years to deliver soil, mulch, plants, shrubbery, Christmas trees, and more to our home. I've also picked up seasonal plants, ferns, flowers, and vegetables that have all been very hearty & healthy. The employees, particularly Rodney & Andrew, have always gone out of their way to be helpful and make sure I got exactly what I needed for the best price. We will continue to use Andy's for many years to come!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words Ashley! We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: justin bradford
text: Andy's is amazing! I loved working with Amanda. She really knows her stuff. Great selection great prices. So convenient to Vestavia. I will be back!

resp.text: Justin - Thanks so much for shopping with us!

name: Amanda Dalvi
text: Super knowledgeable with great friendly staff. They even drew me a diagram of how to plant the trees I bought. And the selection of what you're looking for is phenomenal. Will go back to finish my backyard paradise 😉

resp.text: Amanda, thank you for coming in. Happy that we could help. Can’t wait to see some pics of that backyard paradise.

name: Elizabeth Livesay
text: I can’t say enough good things about Andy’s. We re-did the shrubbery in front of our house and they walked us through The whole nursery and gave us advice on what to get and how much. They also ordered anything they didn’t have in stocked and had it all delivered in less than a week! The prices are VERY resonable as well. So happy with my experience and the amazing customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for shopping with us! We are always here to answer any questions you may have. Look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Rider 0401
text: Andy's is the best!  They have an AMAZING selection of plants and planters and they are the only nursery that can make a soil mix that keep my succulents alive!  I have bought some succulents on the off season online and in the commercial stores and they don't hold a candle to Andy's.  The staff is just phenomenal, very knowledgeable and happy to answer any questions.  They also have a really cool little koi pond that my boys love!

resp.text: Kristina, thank you for coming in and shopping with us. The next time your in we have some fish food that the boys can use to feed the fish.

name: Judy Cutcliffe
text:
My go to place too! Staff can answer all my questions and are very helpful and courteous .
I buy all my plants at Andy's .I love redeeming those bonus bucks!  Judy Cutcliffe

resp.text: Thanks for the five star review Judy! We love helping customers with their questions. Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Susan Richardson
text: Love this place! Huge variety to choose from! Knowledgeable, friendly staff that went out of their way to help and make sure I had what was needed. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Susan! We try our best to help our customers in any way we can. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Wendolyn Martin
text: I’ve been here a few times and was satisfied every time. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for being a loyal customer!

name: Kaye Waugh
text: I visited Andy's Creekside nursery  I was able to find different kinds of perennials that I don't have .I wished that there was a nursery close to my house that was as friendly and had the selection of Andy's. I locked my keys in the truck with my service dog . Andy and two employees helped me by calling On Star and the police to get my doors unlocked . They were such a blessing for me .I don't live in Alabama and was there to help my son who had been sick , I will never forget their kindness , concern , and patience they showed to me . I will be going back on my next visit to Alabama .

resp.text: Our Nursery is ever changing throughout the seasons. We look forward to serving you next time you're in town.

name: Elaine Robinowich
text: Andy’s was extremely professional as they completed a thorough spring cleaning of our yard.  They did everything as requested and left the yard looking great for the beginning of Spring.

resp.text: Thanks so much for using our Andy's Landscape Services! Look forward to helping you more in the future.

name: elizabeth smoot
text: The service and expertise at Andy’s can’t be beat!! Take your planters and let them take care of the rest!! Beautiful!

resp.text: We have fun creating beautiful mixed containers for our customers. Thanks so much for shopping with us Elizabeth!

name: Rhonda Weeks (Arcole)
text: Good selection of plants.

name: Lisa Silver
text: Andy and his staff were wonderful to work with when we ordered a tree as a memorial gift. They were on top of everything and delivered as promised. I highly recommend this nursery!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Lisa! Tree Memorials are a wonderful way to remember those we love. We were honored to help make this possible.

name: Garrett Hutchins
text: Very helpful and friendly staff and a great selection of plants

resp.text: Thanks so much for the five star review! We look forward to helping you with all your future gardening needs!

name: Ur mOm
text: Can’t wait to decorate my landscape with what I saw at Andy’s.  Staff was very helpful and the plants were beautiful and there was a great variety.

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Cassandra! We look forward to helping you again in the near future!

name: Frank Saunee
text: Love seeing all the videos of the plants  in fountains. The displays are very appealing.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We are excited about our new line of fountains. Looking forward to warmer weather.

name: Mollie Barrett
text: LOVE this nursery!! Wish it was closer to my home town..everyone is super helpful knowledgeable  and friendly!! I'll be back!!

resp.text: We look forward to helping you next time your in town. Thanks so much for shopping with us!

name: Jamie Smith
text: Always a great experience with people who really know their stuff! Will definitely be back soon!

resp.text: Fantastic! Please come back and often! We are getting more and more new merchandise in all the time. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Bryan Jenkins
text: True professionals within their industry. They are always prompt, courteous and knowledgeable. I buy from Andy’s anytime I need flowers, shrubs, plants or trees.

resp.text: Thanks so much for being a loyal customer! We love helping you out and look forward to helping you with your gardening needs in the future.

name: Lynn Stanford
text: service was great

name: Darren Mullinax
text: Great service. Staff was extremely helpful and the storefront was well organized.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Darren! We pride ourselves on having knowledgeable staff. Looking forward to helping you with all your gardening and design needs.

name: B H
text: Amanda has a outstanding personality and a smile from ear to ear that lights up your day. Thank you Andy's

resp.text: Thanks for the glowing review Billy! We look forward to helping you with all your landscape, gardening and design needs.

name: tim townley
text: Love love Andy's and in the last month the stores really coming together and can't wait for the veggies

resp.text: As the weather improves, we will bring in more and more veggies. Look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Linda Shunnarah
text: Tracy was very helpful and nice. Answered my questions and gave me options. Thanks

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Linda! We look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Deborah Newsom
text: Fantastic service - very personable.  Will answer any question and the employees go out of their way to assist you with anything you need.

resp.text: Thank you so much for shopping with us Deborah. We try to help out as much as we can. Look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Leslie Livingston
text:
I love the plants at andys .!!! #AmadaDoesGreatWork!
Will recommend andys .!

resp.text: Thank so much Leslie! We love Amanda and agree - She does amazing work. Thanks for the recommendation and review!

name: TLSJohn
text: Great staff and very helpful! Highly recommend Andy’s!

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us! Our staff looks forward to helping you with all your gardening and design needs in the future.

name: Marshall Auerbach
text: Large selection of plants and flowers. Very helpful and friendly.

name: Tracy Townley
text: Beautiful plants, and helpful and talented staff.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Tracy! Look forward to serving you again in the future.

name: Amy Tankersley
text: Always friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thanks so much Amy! Look forward to helping you in the future!

name: brad topper
text: Excellent!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Brad!

name: Andrea Nuss
text: Staff was very help and friendly. I will b returning soon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! We look forward to helping you next time you are in!

name: Rhonda Bellew
text: I absolutely love the plants at Andy's!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Rhonda! We love plants and really appreciate your business!

name: Ben
text: Very helpful!

name: Daniel Minson Pucciariello
text: The best host mom in the whole World. Also the best potter I know. She's just brilliant.

name: Helena watson
text: Best pottery Instructor in the tri county areas. Sharon is the Best and is a talented potter as well!!!

name: Bailey Fawcett
text: Had absolutely the best experience in there today! My designer, Ashley, was SO kind and attentive. I know I did not give the clearest description of what I wanted but she figured it. I couldn’t be more pleased! I am so excited for my furniture to come!

resp.text: Hi Bailey, thank you so much for your feedback! Ashley is a huge asset to our team in Hoover. She is so knowledgeable and professional. So glad to hear of your experience and we can't wait to hear of how your home turns out! Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Tava Chandler
text: I recently needed to furnish several rooms in our new home. Ashley White came to my home and listened to my needs, measured my spaces, and helped me to identify the pieces needed for each room. Ashley was very knowledgeable and helped make the process of selecting finishes and fabrics enjoyable. Her assistance helped me to be confident in my choices.

resp.text:
Hello Tava!  Thank you for taking the time to share insight regarding your experience with designer Ashley White at the Birmingham Design Center. Ashley is an exceptional designer who actively listens to understand her clients’ needs. From there, Ashley helps them navigate the many custom options while narrowing down on the functional solutions that reflect their style and design preference. Thank you so much for your 5-Star Review. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your experience and hope that your furnishings bring you joy for many years to come!
- Birmingham Design Center

name: Cynthia Parker
text: My experience at Ethan Allen has been extremely stress free and pleasant. This is due primarily to the friendly, yet professional service of Ashley White.  Her eye for design along with her helpful guidance (actually visiting the space in my home) has made the purchase of my new bed room décor a cinch! Looking forward to purchasing more excellent quality furniture as well as working with Ashley. I appreciate the time she put into making this experience a great one!

resp.text:
Hi Cynthia! Thank You for providing insight about your experience at the Birmingham Design Center. We are so glad that you all decided to give Ethan Allen a try at earning your business. Professional Designer Ashley White actively listens to her client’s needs and concerns in order to tailor solutions that are both functional and aesthetically appealing. Ashley is ecstatic that you enjoyed the design process in entirety. Cynthia, Thank You the 5-Star Rating and for choosing us to be a part of your home furnishing experience!
-Birmingham Design Center

name: Alexa Mallard
text: Ashley was a great help in finding the perfect bed to compliment our EA furniture we bought twenty years ago. She was creative and a great communicator who  helped me visualize a new look. The Hoover store was clean and had several things in place to ensure safety and health during the pandemic.

resp.text: Hi Alexa, thank you for your review. Ashley is a great asset to our team in Birmingham. Safety has always been a focus for Ethan Allen, and especially during this current challenge we are committed to keeping our staff and clients safe.  Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Mary Neil
text: Ashley was very helpful in the showroom and drawing layouts with pricing.  She reached out, was good at communicating, sharing her cell and email. Ashley made it easy and quick working on our sectional, developing the final scheme and completing pricing for our order.  We are very pleased.

resp.text: Hi Mary, thank you so much for the feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with Ashley at our Birmingham Design Center. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Elizabeth Reed
text: Remodeling a kitchen after a house fire is stressful, to say the least.  Our kitchen table and chairs came from Ethan Allen nearly 20 years ago so I went back to them to see if they had counter hight stools that would coordinate with existing furniture.  Ashley White knew exactly what I was looking for.  She suggested the perfect leg and finish based on a photo of my table and chairs.  Our new stools were just delivered and they are perfection!  It's always a pleasure to shop in Ethan Allen.  Thank you Ashley, for also making it fun!

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, thank you for such great feedback on your experience with Ethan Allen. We are so glad you were able to work with Ashley and she took such great care of you. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: john placey
text: We have enjoyed owning Ethan Allen furniture and furnishings over the decades!  Some pieces like our dining room chairs and table still look and feel brand new even though purchased in the early 1970s!  Their staff is always friendly and helpful!  A bit pricey but we have found that you truly get to enjoy what you paid for!!!

name: Ronald Payne
text: After searching many stores, we found our perfect dining room table at our local Ethan Allen and it was on sale. The table had two leaves which would be needed to host our large family group for Thanksgiving. The sales lady was most helpful and promised that it would be delivered before Thanksgiving only about six weeks away. We were kept informed every step on the way and our table arrived four days prior to Thanksgiving. The leaves are a little hard to get in and out but that should get better with more use. We love the table!

resp.text: Ronald, I am so happy to hear about your experience! We love when the process goes smoothly. I know you will enjoy your table for many Thanksgivings to come. Thank you for reaching out to let us know, we appreciate it.

name: Catherine Benefield
text: The whole experience with Ethan Allen has been pleasant and productive. Designer Kelley Horton guided me through the process of selecting furniture (sofa, 2 chairs, ottomans) and fabrics. The furniture was delivered by professionals who NOT ONCE bumped a wall or door frame. They carefully set up the furniture and carted away the wrappings. The designer then brought paint samples and assisted in selecting a paint color for the walls. From start to finish, I was treated with professionalism and courtesy. The furniture is well made, beautiful in my home, and most importantly, comfortable. Will I purchase from Ethan Allen on Hwy. 150 in Hoover again? Absolutely.

resp.text: Hi Catherine! Thank you for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience at our Hoover location. We appreciate it very much! We are pleased to hear that Kelley could make designing your home a breeze and know it MUST look beautiful. Thank you for also pointing out how amazing our delivery team was; they are quite the asset to Ethan Allen! We hope you enjoy your beautiful pieces for many years to come and appreciate your business very much.

name: Amy Rickles
text: Ashely did a great job of helping us pick a style of furniture, wood accents, and fabric. Well worth the time and money spent. Would highly recommend.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Amy. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. Ashley is a huge asset to our Birmingham team!

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Kelly, at Ethan Allen, was so fantastic!! She took so much time out for me & assisted me with choosing the fabric for my cornices and curtains. I love my new curtains!!! The reason I rated 3 stars is because Ethan Allen is way over priced I found the same rug I was going to buy from Ethan Allen at RH for much less. I understand Ethan Allen has nice fabrics but I've seen much nicer for far less.

resp.text: Cameron, thank you so much for the feedback! I am so thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your new curtains! Custom curtains can be a big project, I am so happy that Kelly was able to partner with you and design and implement something you love.

name: Pat Ford
text: Great purchasing and service experience! Ashley greeted us warmly when we arrived and quickly showed us what we were looking for and provided material samples that were perfect for our needs.  She made the whole process quick and easy.  The delivery guys were the best I have ever seen.  They  handled the new chairs and sofa with care and were careful to not damage our wood floor in moving the sofa into place.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review Pat! We're happy to hear everything went perfect during your delivery and that our team did an excellent job as well. Thanks for taking the time to write about us. We know Ashley appreciates your compliment as well!

name: Sherry Vaughn
text:
I have been buying Ethan Allen furniture for over 25 years because I know their furniture is a quality product and is timeless. But the thing that I have come to appreciate the most about Ethan Allen is their free design service. The designers know their business well and do a great job.
Kelley and Lauren with Hoover Ethan Allen have both been so helpful with my current home renovation.
I literally cannot praise Kelley Horton enough for how she has helped me to transform my home into a more modern and updated style utilizing what I currently have and incorporating new pieces to blend. She has spent countless hours  in helping me to choose the right pieces for my home including furniture, window treatments, rugs, artwork, bedding, and even down to the smallest decorative accent pieces. My home looks beautifully done with effortless design and functionality now.
The entire process from designing to delivery and installation has been very professional and I could not have asked for better.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome review Sherry! It brings us so much joy to know how appreciated our brand is and that everyone on our team gives their all. Kelley goes above and beyond for her clients so we're glad to hear that you find her as special as we do! We know every detail matters and strive to ensure that our customer service is superb. Thank you again for all your kind words Sherry. Enjoy your newly renovated home!

name: Randy Mason
text: My wife and I were on vacation and staying at the hotel next door and decided to browse.  Ashley did such an awesome job reviewing and showing us the bed we looking for we bought one that day. We could have waited until we got home to Michigan but really liked the kind and genuine service that Ashley provided. That was our first time in an Ethan Allen store and we have now set up a home appointment back in Michigan. Thank you Ashley!!

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review, Randy! We are delighted to hear how welcoming Ashley was and greatly appreciate you stopping by. Thanks for joining the Ethan Allen family!

name: Emma Bolden
text: From browsing the store to having my pieces delivered, the entire process of buying furniture from the Ethan Allen in Hoover was a dream. We were greeted warmly as we came in the store, and designer Kelley Horton was extremely helpful and kind (and funny!). The delivery crew was prompt, respectful, and careful. An excellent experience all-around!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review of our Hoover location, Emma! We're happy to hear that Kelley made your experience with Ethan Allen a delightful one and that our delivery team took it one step further. We appreciate your business!

name: Alissa Hill
text: I would never purchase from Ethan Allen for anything that has to be made like furniture! We purchase a formal dining table and ten chairs to accompany it. Not only did our table show up with a large dent underneath (unfortunately we didn’t notice until the delivery men sped away) which they refused to do anything about but we placed the order in June 2019.... it’s now October 29 we still have no chairs. Their customer service department has been zero help with figuring out why. I would expect this from Wayfair  but when you spend over 6000.00 dollars for a table and chairs you expect far superior customer service. Guess I’ve learned my lesson and will forever stay out of Ethan Allen.

resp.text:
Alissa, I am so sorry to hear about your experience. I would love to look into it further and find a resolution but I am unfortunately not able to locate your order. Was it possibly purchased under another name? Or could you provide a phone number or order number? If you wouldn't mind emailing me at laura.smith@ethanallen.com I would love to see what we can do to make this situation right.

I look forward to working with you on a resolution.

Laura

name: Hazel Summerville
text: Bought an expensive leather sleeper sofa with anvair mattress that does not work! Call and representative cam out verified slow leas in air bed. NO OTHER RESPONSE!

resp.text: Hazel, I am so sorry to hear your feedback. I reached out to the store and they confirmed that they have been in contact with you. The replacement air mattress has been ordered and they have the estimated promise date to pass along to you. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We look forward to resolving the issue.

name: Brian Calhoun
text: Ashley White was a pleasure to work with at the Hoover Ethan Allen.  It's really hard to get my wife and I on the same page when it comes to decorating.   Ashley did a great job listening to both of us as well as seeing some of our style when she came to our house for the initial assessment.  She was very patient and came up with great suggestions of things that would work well in our space and with the existing furniture we had.  At the end of the process we now have a room full of art that gives us a finished and professional look.  Thanks Ashley!

resp.text: Brian, thank you so much for the wonderful feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed Ashley's talent as much as we do!

name: Lynn Meany
text: I bought 6 dining chairs, picked out fabric and even ordered extra fabric to make pillows with.  I received excellent service!  Everything arrived on time in perfect condition.   Top notch quality furniture, pleasant sales team, willingness to work to please you...I wouldn't hesitate to shop here again.  Thank you Lauren for all your help!

resp.text: Lynn, Thank you for the feedback! We are thrilled to hear that the experience was perfect and can't wait to work with you again.

name: Becky Charton
text: Ashley at Ethan Allen in Hoover was so patience  with my Aunt and I, she stayed late, called us back after hours and  did not hesitate when asked hard questions! After shopping all over Birmingham EA had some of the most stylish offerings with beautiful leather selections. Your prices were in line with fair market pricing giving us a high quality and a high design selection. Thanks for meeting all our needs!

resp.text: Becky, thank you so much for the feedback. We are thrilled to hear that Ethan Allen was just what you were looking for! We agree with you, Ashley is amazing! I'm happy to hear you adore her as much as we do!  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We appreciate it!

name: Lisa Bice
text: Ashley White is wonderful to work with! - She is professional, intuitive and creative in her approach to pulling together furniture ideas, as well as accessories. I walked in to the store the first day knowing specific items we needed to replace, but did not even know where to begin to find what would work best for our home, with things we already have and want to keep. She asked questions, REALLY listened, and that's where her innate creativity kicked in. She has "nailed it" time after time with unique suggestions, and I look forward to working with her again as we update this home. I have not seen this 5 star level of customer service that Ashley delivers in a long time, and Ethan Allen is fortunate to have this jewel! And we LOVE our new pieces - the quality is wonderful, too! Thank you Ashley!  Lisa Bice

resp.text: Wow, Lisa thank you for this awesome review! We couldn't agree more. Ashley is amazing! We love hearing how appreciated her design service was and that you're home came together beautifully. We strive for quality products and try to ensure our clients receive nothing short of perfection. Thank you for working with us!

name: Mary Sood
text: I love Ethan Allen. They have the most beautiful furniture and accessories, and their designers are phenomenal. They have done such a great job of helping me to select and arrange my furniture and accessories. Everyone who enters my home raves!

name: Countess Fleming
text: Great customer service!  Scott Richardson is an awesome store manager.  Very attentive sales people!  I plan to be back very soon.

name: Electrical Power and Control
text: Nice

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Electrical Power And. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Susan Lewis
text: Lov Ethan Allen. Just bought a new recliner I love it

resp.text: Thank you Susan for the 5-star review! We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Thanks!

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: Whatever happened to beautiful Ethan Allen furniture? All of their furniture is ultra modern with absolutely no character, all for totally outrageous prices.

name: Leanne Dillard
text: Great service and  great selection of fine furniture and Hunter Douglas window treatments.

name: Gerald Ephraim
text: The furniture There is so nice we spent at least 18 thousand.

name: Jessica Hodges
text: he was remebering we was doing a class play of him we remeber u

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review! I'm so glad to hear that you remember the wonderful Ethan Allen! We are so honored to have our company named after such an amazing part of history.

name: Edgar A
text: Does not return calls. They lied to us on several occassions.  Gave us a receipt and when we went to pick up the item they told us the price was incorrect. They will not let us take it per the price on the reciept because it was priced incorrectly.  On a separate item we purchased did not come with the hardware.  When we asked them about it they told us they are universal screws!  Go to Lowes or Home Depot and ask for universal furniture screws!  Called corporate no help! Don't waste your time. Called Peach Tree, GA and they ordered what i needed in 3 minutes.If you want Ethan Allen go to Peach Tree, GA.  If you want better service go to Wal-Mart.

name: Michael Shelby
text: Always friendly and quality furniture.

resp.text:
Michael,
Thank you so much for the feedback!  We take a lot of pride in what we do and the items we create and love seeing comments like this so we can share with our Design Staff and our plants.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to seeing you in the Design Center soon!
Thanks, again,
Shane

name: Amy Johnston
text: Pricey. Not a great selection.

resp.text:
Thank you Amy for taking the time to leave a review. Ethan Allen is high end furniture and intended to last, we stand by our quality and craftsmanship, this is where you see the difference in the pricing from us to the other brands. The pricing is in line with the high end market for these reasons. We offer a complimentary design service with talented professional designers who are there to help as much or as little as you would like. We also offer Great, flexible finance options. Ethan Allen is always working to stay relevant with the trends but keeping our classic options still available, introducing new introductions every few months.

We appreciate you taking the time to visit our Design Center and wish you luck on you search for the right selections for your home!

name: J C-A
text: Great Furniture!

resp.text: Jocelyn, so happy you love the furniture & thank you so much for the great review! Our team at The Hoover Ethan Allen location always appreciates it!

name: lashun frizzle
text: Great

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to review us, Lashun.   Please let us know what we can do to make the experience better!  We want all Ethan Allen clients to have the very best experience possible and value your feedback!

name: James “Jay” Casey
text: Great classic furniture.

name: Larissa Larsen
text: She is wonderful at making pots, angels, etc...❤

name: Wayne Sanders
text: Quality products and polite management.

name: Matthew Chapman
text: Great Gallery with a beautiful mix of art and gift items.  I unfortunately do not live local, but I have had the pleasure of visiting in person a few times. The owner and staff have always been extremely nice and helpful. The bulk of my purchases have been via phone & online, all orders have shipped prompt and carefully packed.

resp.text: Thank you so much Matthew! Thank you for supporting out small business and local artist!

name: Laura Wilson
text:
Four Seasons Gallery has some beautiful local art plus lots of unique  gifts for just
about everyone including pottery from Peter's Pottery and EttaB Pottery bith from Mississippi. The staff is always friendly and helpful. They even sell Twine a pure CBD oil.

name: Melanie Messer
text: I love this place. Great place to find unique gifts for family & friends & the owner & staff are always very helpful. Go check it out!

resp.text: Thank you Melanie for the lovely review. I'm happy to know you love shopping at Four Seasons Gallery!

name: Tish Weaster
text: Love their presentation and items.   They are helpful without being pushy.  Lovely place for unusual gifts.

resp.text: Thank you Tish. So glad we could be helpful.

name: Julia Peart
text: Great art and gift gallery! Lots of neat items, jewelry and gorgeous paintings...sweet ladies to help you too!

name: Sylvia N.
text: Top Shelf customer service helps you find the perfect, unique gift for the one you love who has everything.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review. You are a wonderful customer.

name: Stuart Lee
text: Great place! Owner and staff are so nice and very knowledgeable. Lots of unique art and season items. Check out the website. It is very up to date.

name: Andrea von Herrmann
text: Love all of the offerings and the people who help. So kind and helpful with great ideas.

name: John Siptak
text: Authentic, inventive, informative, local. Unique face jugs. John and Cotton(the blue healer) friendly and fun.

name: Rob Malone
text: John makes some amazing pieces. If you're passing through the Fairhope area it's a must for your to do list.

name: Diana Kritinar
text: They have SO many beautiful plants, wood furniture - gliders, rocking chairs, swings, the smoked chicken was absolutely delicious, as was the berry chicken salad, they have keto options, sweets, bread, I just love this place!

name: Shaleigh Miller
text: One of the best experiences I’ve had. Amazing product variety & the people were fantastic! Definitely will be back.

name: Larry Jacobs
text: Great produce love their ribs .staff is friendly an very helpful. On the down side the man that makes the flowers sold our grave flowers sold our order to someone else he wasn’t very nice. Rick an his brother are the best.I recommend everyone shop and to support this local business.

name: Jo Larson
text: Super nice folks.  Parking was a bit crowded bit that's because the place is popular. All the produce seemed fresh.

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: I love Rick's Produce! The staff is amazing and their produce is so fresh and great and so are their plants. The tomatoes are definitely a fave for my fam!

name: Rick Slade
text: Great experience! Very nice facility! Outstanding staff! Can't wait to go back!

name: Michael R Ballard
text: Excellent choices...fresh produce...great BBQ...homemade soups are the best...garden shop and wood furniture availabl...always friendly and willing to help

name: Teresa Robinson
text: I love this place. Friendly people and great produce. Best place around.

name: Beverly Davis
text: Love Rick's!! Got some beautiful palm trees and flowers and the best ribs ever today!!

name: george williams
text:
This market is clean, well stocked, staff is knowledgeable & hospitable, fresh veggies galore & great variety of fruit as well...awesome place to score groceries 👌 Also lots of jams, jellies, honey, sauces and other goodies. Meats, casseroles & plenty of sweet tooth treats.
My wife scored a bounty of vegetables and a bunch of scupernongs & I brought home a beautiful cedar porch swing.
We will be returning anytime we are close by 😊

name: David Martin
text: Friendly folks with great products.

name: anthony givens
text: Its a pretty neat place to shop. They should encourage mask wearing till we get thru this virus thing.

name: Eric Malone
text: Great place to shop really nice layout and the customer service is great

name: Donna Patterson
text:
Ricks is awesome. Freshest of vegetables, and fruits. Love it all.
Added to say, the meats are so good. The Boston butts are a family favorite .The bologna is great. I also purchased all the flowers for graveside decoration at Ricks this year. If you have not been there! What are you waiting on? It is an awesome place to shop for fresh veggies and just about any thing you want.  Thanks Rick we could not survive without you! ❤

name: Maria Gholston
text: First time stopping by today... The staff and owner (Rick) are very hospitable and friendly.  True exame.of "Southern Hospitality". Will definitely be back.

name: Lindsey Hanna
text: Everything looked super clean and lovely, even the bathroom! The veggies looked amazing and the section of jams and pickles was great.

name: Big Hand Dave
text: Great produce!!!  Someone is always ready to help however needed and i am always greeted with smiles.

name: Reagan Boyles
text: Lots of inventory, good prices, staff is helpful and friendly. Flowers, pumpkins, mums, cornhole game boards, lots of good stuff here.

name: Phillip James
text: Great. Smoked meats and good variety of other things.

name: jake and bake
text: We loved the chairs they had. Very friendly people. A little high on the produce but they have some beautiful produce.

name: Bootsie Lewis
text: I have been a customer of Ricks Produce since they opened years ago! Truly love the fresh fruit, peaches, can't get enough of them. If you haven't tried some of the jams, hot sauces or the salsa you should!!

name: Roger Coats
text: Good variety of different items

name: Amberia Spiller
text: Best place to get fresh fruits and vegetables. The smoked meats taste amazing. The staff are friendly and extremely helpful.

name: Tyler Oliver
text: Great selection of produce as well as other food products (bacon, sausage, hamburger meat). Try the Mama Cole's fried pies! Great customer service as well.

name: Summer Trapp
text: Always love the fresh quality vegetable from Rick's each year. Today was my first stop of the season and I was thrilled to find that they now carry all my fave Dutch Oven goodies.

text: Very pleased with my visit. Freindly helpful staff. Fair prices.. I'll definitely be back..

name: Diane Faust
text: The freshest fruit and vegetables you will find...straight out of the garden....don't forget the ribs...fresh smoked meat also...😁

name: Kathy Baggett

text: I'm from out of state and a lady suggested to come here. So I drove 45 min for rude and u professional service. Never again ill spend my money else where.

name: Bryant Mauldin
text: Wonderful place with a great staff. Make you feel at home. While carrying some of the Best available Products in the SHOALS

name: Eric Robert

name: Amy Allen

name: Edgar Ferrell

text: Great selection and very helpful associates!

name: Dana McGuire
text: Always great produce and personal service.

name: Derek South
text: Good selection.

name: Bonnie Daily
text: Great produce,  staff, and prices!

name: Sherry Roberts
text: Rick and Kevin are special guy we are blessed to have them in our little town and all the rest of those sweet folks bless you all

name: Kippen Gallagher
text: Stacy is a wonderful artist potter. She is constantly evolving with her designs and her glaze work. She's a fascinating artist. Her work is a pleasure to have in my home and being used on a daily basis. From plates for my grandchild years ago to more recent mugs.

resp.text: Kipper, I appreciate that so much. Thank you. It’s been a pleasure getting to know you

name: Kitten Kaos
text:
I have taken two classes with Stacy at the Mill over this summer.

The Octopus class was incredibly detailed and amazingly cool. Nothing held back; Stacy is invested in her students having as much success as possible in the process. She was accommodating to my flight schedule and carry-on restrictions and worked with me on the things I could not bring on the plane. The class was fun and I got to meet and make new friends with a great bunch of clay folk. And, I made a crazy octopus bowl to boot!

Later in the summer, I was able to take another class, Slip Trailing, on my way to a work seminar. This was a tremendous compliment to the octopus work, and will have applications in a lot of my other work. It adds a dimension (literally) that is not available through glaze or underglaze. She was detailed enough in the chemistry that I was hooked, but not so much that the class was lost. The demos and slip play go a super long way in understanding the intricasies of the process.

Now to the area. Alabama is just lovely! The hot sticky weather that they were having was perfect for my cold northern blood. The flora in Alabama is completely different to mine, and I enjoyed driving around to take it all in. The Mills are an amazing space dedicated to the arts and I could have spent days wandering the booths. And!! Anyone visiting Stacy who is gluten free or paleo; I found the most delightful bakery and eatery. Their dedicated gluten free facility has some of the best stuff, and that includes BEFORE my diagnosis. Try the jalapeno cheddar scones at Mason Dixon Bakery, you’ll never want to leave.

So seriously, if the opportunity comes to have class with Stacy and S.P.Morgan Studios, take it; you will have no regrets.

name: Betsy
text: I have purchased several pieces from Stacy Morgan and every piece is as beautiful and well crafted as the last. The glazes and her techniques make each piece truly special whether it is functional like a great noodle bowl or decorative. Stacy responds quickly and is very helpful. I will keep ordering more.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Betsy! I appreciate your kind words and your support.

name: Kathryn Somers
text: I have taken 2 workshops from Stacy.  She is a wonderful instructor who is able to communicate and demonstrate effectively to her classes.   She is funny, passionate, curious and caring, thoughtful and a fountain of knowledge.   The facility at Lowe Mill in Huntsville is fantastic and her studio there is an artist's dream - open and full of light.    Her work is fully of whimsy and charm and is always flawless in its execution.   I am delighted to have a piece of her work and it makes me smile whenever I walk by it.

resp.text: Thanks, Kathryn! I hope we get to reconnect soon.

name: Cheryl Krebs
text: An incredibly talented potter with a ♡ of gold. I own a few of Stacy’s pieces and enjoy them even more each day. They are durable and SO FUN! I am also a potter so I have pretty high standards for skill and aesthetics... her pieces exceed the quality of most potters and the aesthetics speak for themselves. If you get a chance to meet Stacy... do it... then when you drink from one of her vessels you can think of her and enjoy the moment even more.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Cheryl. I learned by being a part of our community. <3

name: Daniela Perallon
text: I'm so picky about pottery, but Stacy's work is incredibly unique, hitting all the notes from moody and dark to bright and whimsical and everywhere in-between. She's always experimenting with new designs and techniques while maintaining top notch quality. I'm proud to own her artwork! We are running out of room on our mug shelf because we can't stop purchasing her mugs.

name: Kiley Salmon
text: I love every piece that I have from here. They are each so unique and beautiful. If you are like me and love the feel of textures on your hands you will love her work. I don't think that I truly ever appreciated the work that goes in to someone making coffee cups and vases but after touching my first cup and following her page I am always in awe of the things that she can make.

resp.text: Thank you! I appreciate the support.

name: SofaQueen OG
text: Her work is simply mesmerizing, the glaze work is the coolest I've ever seen. I had to get a purple squid mug and it's one of my absolute favorites.  Almost too pretty to use. I've gotten so many compliments on it and considering I've used it at least twice a week since last June, I think it's holding up well for hand made pottery. I look forward to expanding my collection.

name: Brittani Tkacz
text: Stacy Morgan is not only a talented artist, but an excellent business owner who communicates well and is extremely accommodating. I had several questions that she answered quickly, and she shipped my purchase quickly. Upon arrival, I was amazed to find the item I had purchased (one of her awesome frog mugs) was even more beautiful in person. The design is excellent too, as the handle is sooo comfy in my hand! I give SP Morgan Studio my highest recommendation!

resp.text: Thank you, Brittani!

name: Deacon Wolfwood
text: Great shop! Full of wonderful pottery for sale, the owner is super friendly, full of wonderful knowledge, and open for custom orders. Mrs. Morgan has a great idea for detail, has amazing glaze techniques, and some beautifully unique pieces, you simply MUST SEE! 10/10 WILL VISIT AGAIN.  She also has an online shop that is Mobile optimized 💛

name: Daniel Ruiz
text: Simply some of the most amazing functional ceramic art I've ever seen. Stacy's a great person and teacher as well. Visit her, buy some of her stuff. You'll be forever grateful. Makes great gifts too!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Daniel!

name: Lisa Andrew
text: I have been an admirer of Stacy Morgan's beautiful unique pottery for a while, so I jumped on the chance to take one of her workshops.  What a fun, outstanding learning experience.  Stacy is not only a talented artist, but also a skilled communicator and teacher.  I enthusiasically recommend her workshops.  When I can't make it to her studio in person, I keep an eye on her website and jump at the chance to add another piece to my collection.

name: Maria Hathcock
text: Stacy is one of the most creative people I know. After falling in love with her techniques at creating her octopus pieces I decided to make the long trek from Texas to her studio at Lowe Mill in Huntsville, Alabama. Not only did I learn all about how to make pieces with her techniques we also quickly became friends. Her easy manner and southern hospitality were endearing and welcoming. We planned a second trip out with the original group we had but were very disappointed to have to reschedule due to Covid-19. It’s been the highlight of my year to return and take more classes with Stacy.

resp.text: Thank you, Laura. I am holding high hopes we get to have our reunion this fall and I am so looking forward to seeing you all again.

name: Mark Campbell
text: Stacy is a very talented potter and a great person.  Her work is thought provoking and beautiful.  I like that she steps out of normal boundaries. I would recommend her work to anybody.

resp.text: Thank you, Mark!

name: Barbara Russell
text: Ordered a lil mug online & it arrived super fast & very well packed. Craftsmanship is excellent. Texture is silky, mug is lightweight but sturdy. Beautiful & exactly as pictured. Thank you so much Stacy! I'll continue collecting your pieces.

resp.text: Thank you Barbara, for your kind words and continued support.

name: Lisa Malone
text: I am privileged to own several of Stacy’s pieces; each is lovely and unique. When I have ordered online with shipping the pieces have been carefully packed and arrived safely. If you are looking for some amazing art, you’re in the right place!

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! I so appreciate your support...you’ve been with me since day one and I am forever grateful.

name: Amanda Conger
text: Stacy's mugs are my handsdown favorites. They are a generous size but not to heavy/bulky to hold with a perfect little thumb spot and gorgeous designs. Whenever we open the cupboard, they are the first mugs everyone makes a beeline for. They wash in the dishwasher (nothing fussy) and have held up wonderfully.

resp.text: Thanks, Amanda. There is no finer compliment to a potter than to know their work is being used and loved regularly!

name: Joseph Bott
text: I have dealt with Stacy at S.P Morgan Studio many times. Her work and business are both amazing and respectful. She works hard to treat customers with care and always has a smile on her face. Without a doubt, one of the best pottery people in the business.

name: Dave Edens
text: When visiting Lowe Mill Stacy's studio is always a must stop. On top of the amazing finished works on display, it is a working pottery studio and you can see her at her craft pretty much most of the time. I have a couple of her pieces and they are both wonderful and functional.

resp.text: Thank you, Dave! Always a pleasure to see you!

name: William Wolf
text: Stacy's artwork is sublime. From the everyday objects like mugs and plates, to the fantastic sculptures of sea creatures and fae beings, everything is beautiful, functional, and most of all filled with her love of her art. I would recommend getting your hands on some of it as soon (and as often) as possible.

resp.text: Thank you, William!

name: gail armand
text: Some of my favorite pottery ever. It is in my personal collection and is one of my favorite things to give people I love. Highly distinctive. I would recognize SP Morgan anywhere, including the Smithsonian. Yes, it is that good.

name: Yvonne Castillo
text: Stacy’s art work is stunning with gorgeous details. I’ve had the pleasure of taking classes from her and learned even more than the class was about. Stacy is always makes sure you understand the reason behind the process as well as the process of the class material. I definitely recommend her classes and beautiful art.

name: Darlena Dettmer
text: I absolutely LOVE this place! Each piece is carefully handcrafted with unique detail and made with the finest of quality! I would give S.P. Morgan Studio more than 5 stars if Google had it.

resp.text: Thank you, Darlena!

name: Jules W
text: I love S.P. Morgan's pottery. I love her creative side along with great quality of mugs, bowls and vases. I live out of state and have never had a problem with receiving my items through shipping.

resp.text: Thank you so much. I try my best

name: OkRandom Art
text: Stacey is a prime example of why I work with local artisans. Every time I pick up a piece of her work I learn something new about her process. The transaction is more personal...it comes with a story...and her work is simply stunning . You will not find these things in a department store. Highly recommended.

name: Heidi See
text: I ordered a cup from Stacy. It came really fast. It was packaged very securely the mug arrived in perfect condition and was exactly what i wanted. She even sent me an extra surprise with it. Thank you so much

name: Helen Lien
text: I have purchased several pieces from Stacey for both myself and as gifts. I could not be more satisfied with each and every purchase. Her designs are creative, unique, and well-executed. Be sure to follow her on Facebook to see her latest glaze experiments and works in progress.

name: Robin Lucas
text: I’ve not only purchased Stacy’s fabulous work, but I’ve taken a workshop as well.  She’s a great teacher and the passion in her work shows in every piece she makes.  I’ve been won over as a fan for life!

resp.text: Thanks, Robin!

name: Elizabeth Lobdell
text: I bought 2 lovely mugs from SP Morgan as gifts. I shamelessly kept them and found something else to give. I absolutely love the way they feel in my hand.

name: Tonya Sitko
text: Stacy’s art is amazing. As an example, her octopus bowls and tentacles are simply extraordinary. Highly recommend.

name: Diahn Ott
text: I’m honored to not only own two of Stacy’s pieces, but to have taken a fantastic workshop on slip-trailing with her. She is a truly wonderful teacher, an inspired artist, and I look forward to a time when I can collect some more of her work and take another class.

resp.text: Thank you, Diahn!

name: Kathryn Phelan
text: Love my mug. The textural details and colors are wonderful. The handle and lip edge are very comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Ronda Bynon
text: Ms. Morgan's potter has a unique quality that makes me keep coming back to purchase something new.  She is also extremely knowledgeable about her art and willing to share that knowledge.

name: Miki Bowman
text: I have a few pieces of her work and I've drooled over many more! Her style is unmistakable and pulls at my heart. Plus, her dog is freakin' awesome.

resp.text: Ha! Thank you! And Whiskey says hello!

name: Susan Burlingame
text: Took a workshop with Stacy. She is generous with her information and process.  A really nice person too.

resp.text: Thank you, Susan!

name: j cole
text: Some of the most beautifully crafted pottery I have ever seen! The octopus pieces are so delicately sculpted and are so incredible!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: V Wyatt
text: I call it my "Tuesday mug," and have been using it most Tuesdays for at least a couple of years. It has been in the dishwasher and the microwave countless times, and so faithfully continues to bring me visual delight as I trundle through my day.

resp.text: That’ll make a potter smile....love hearing that my work is holding up well to real use!! Thank you!

name: Denise Joyal
text: Wonderfully talented artist. A must-have for your ceramics collection!

resp.text: Denise, I so appreciate the kind words! Thank you.

name: Jeanna Wing
text: This studio has some amazing, original work! Wonderful person, great atmosphere!

name: Brenda Armistead
text: Absolutely LOVE this artist's studio.  Wonderful work, great atmosphere.

name: Rebekah Krieger
text: I love my little cup, it’s well made and arrived quickly!

name: Joanie Nash
text: Stacy is a wonderful teacher. Thank you for everything you do and share.

resp.text: Thank you, Joanie!

name: Rebecca Ziemer
text: Stacy is AWESOME!!!!! Great personality, flawless products, and entertaining as heck.

resp.text: Thanks, Rebecca!

name: ambi dreamt
text: Talented artist & potter living her dream, with a gleam in her eye & a wit to her banter.  Check out her craft!

resp.text: Thank you, Jennifer!

name: Kris Gibson
text: Amazing pottery!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kris!
